sourceMeaningMnemonic: Sew <radical>thread</radical> through your <radical>top hat</radical> and to the top hats of other people you know and you'll turn into a <kanji>group</kanji> of top hat wearing people. You're all connected by the thread now, so everyone will assume you're a group, even if that's all you guys have going for yourselves.
meaningInfo: Picture a group of people threaded together by their top hats. Don't you want to be part of a cool group like that? Your own top hat team.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>group</kanji> decides to make <reading>so</reading>ap (<ja>そ</ja>) together. You take off your top hats and use them as soap molds, mixing together all of your favorite smells and colors.
readingInfo: Imagine being in a group of soap makers. Picture the soap bubbles floating between all of you.
